overview: The well-established and enormous library infrastructure of the mentor Institute MANIT Bhopal is shared with the students of IIIT Bhopal. The library developed with academic collection having a huge number of titles and volumes, journals and magazines both in printed version and electronic format.
overview2: The library is spacious and divided into different sections to facilitate proper utilization of available resources. The library is taking constant efforts to provide relevant resources to its users by using different technologies
